title: Yorick
body:
So what's everyone think of Yorick now?

Build paths etc general game play?

Any other comments?

replies.body: Hes going to make a boss support/top

> [{quoted}](name=CHEESYLEEKS,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=UH3g30pE,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-08-25T12:22:22.007+0000)
>
> Hes going to make a boss support/top

Oh?  How so?  Elaborate on support more is you would be so kind?
I'd say of mix of HP and AD. Just generally tanky all around.

I think Yorick's rework has delivered on what it set out to do and given us a much more interactive champion with clear weaknesses and strengths with play making potential that can assist your team outside of spamming ghouls until the enemy dies while keeping the core concept of a grave digger intact. 

I would build him based on his scalings, bruiser leaning towards AD mainly going something like {{item:3142}} {{item:3071}} {{item:3158}} {{item:3742}} {{item:3026}} with some optional items like {{item:3074}} , {{item:3146}} {{item:3022}} {{item:3078}} {{item:3143}} {{item:3072}}, but I can't say for sure since I haven't had a chance to play him.
